description.raw:
I only realized there had been a previous attempt at integrating codecov when the branch name wasn't available :) See pull request #126.

Integration with codecov was pretty straight-forward. The main issue was getting coverage to work, for some reason `make coverage` is failing on Pipelines, and I wasn't able to reproduce it locally with docker. So I ended up just calling `lcov` directly.

Here's the coverage report for this branch:

https://codecov.io/bb/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/tree/2dfe12aed13b71402588486f1ae7cc90d0940d0d

I tried many different ways to exclude tests from the report without using the codecov configuration file, because that behaviour would be closer to what `make coverage` is doing, but after many tries, I surrended and used `codecov.yml` instead.
